name: Bankless
title: The Real Reason NVDA Crashed â€“ NOT DEEPSEEK! #nvidia #stocks #deepseek #ai #crypto
text:
Synopsis
A viral article about AI, shared by influential tech figures, potentially triggered a market downturn, with the author suggesting this as the primary cause of recent stock market volatility.

Key Insights
- The speaker discusses a market crash that occurred on a Monday
- An article written by the speaker was published late on a Friday
- The article was shared by prominent tech personalities:
  - Chamoth (1.8 million followers)
  - Y Combinator's Gary Tan
- The article was praised by these influential figures
- The market crash was not directly related to DeepSeek's technical papers (V3 and R1), contrary to some news headlines
- The speaker implies that the widespread sharing of their article might have influenced market dynamics
